main.name: Friendly UI/UX
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Talent for logic made me grow since junior high school, I am good at math and like to solve things, I took my life path in programming, because of the mindset that I instilled that I will always succeed.

work.title: Software Engineer (Front-End Developer)
work.description: Working on several Company's Main Projects called IKI Mitra and several Supporting Projects of the Main Project, as well as solving several problems that occurred.

work.title: Operational Manager & Community Relation
work.description: Manage the overall course of business operations and become a regulator of community relations of application users.

work.title: Business Analyst
work.description: Make the entire business plan of the newly built company, as well as organize and manage the business and employees.

work.title: Project Manager & Software Engineer
work.description: Make the entire application design and application work, find new ideas for application improvisation, and develop the application.

work.title: Manager & Head Barista
work.description: Manage all barista and cafe service, calibrate coffee, manage supply and spare materials and play an important role in the cafe.

work.title: Head Barista & Cooker
work.description: Assisting the cooking department due to staff shortages, managing all the barista and cafe service, calibrating coffee, managing supplies and spare ingredients and playing an important role in the cafe.

work.title: Barista
work.description: Barista and make coffee and do the best service.
